Description: Censer; cast bronze; hexagonal, with three feet at the bottom, three crosses projecting in the upper corners above them, and three loops in the remaining three upper corners; a chain attached to each of the loops; the three chains joined above by a ring for hanging.
Curator's comments: Parallels: O. Wulff, Altchristliche und mittelalterliche byzantinische und italienische Bildwerke (Berlin 1909) cat. 983, 985-986.
